```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
require(data.table)

```

# Reading tidy data

```{r echo=FALSE}


data.EU.1990 <- read.csv("Output_EU_1990.csv")
data.EU.2010 <- read.csv("Output_EU_2010.csv")
data.ROW.1990 <- read.csv("Output_ROW_1990.csv")
data.ROW.2010 <- read.csv("Output_ROW_2010.csv")

head(data.EU.1990)
head(data.EU.2010)
head(data.ROW.1990)
head(data.ROW.2010)

attach(data.EU.1990)
attach(data.EU.2010)
attach(data.ROW.1990)
attach(data.ROW.2010)

df.EU.1990 <- data.frame(country=data.EU.1990$country, le=data.EU.1990$le, hale=data.EU.1990$hale, yld=data.EU.1990$yld, the=data.EU.1990$the, gdp=data.EU.1990$gdp, the.gdp=data.EU.1990$the.gdp)

df.EU.2010 <- data.frame(country=data.EU.2010$country, le=data.EU.2010$le,hale=data.EU.2010$hale, yld=data.EU.2010$yld, the=data.EU.2010$the, gdp=data.EU.2010$gdp, the.gdp=data.EU.2010$the.gdp)

df.ROW.1990 <- data.frame(country=data.ROW.1990$country, le=data.ROW.1990$le,hale=data.ROW.1990$hale, yld=data.ROW.1990$yld, the=data.ROW.1990$the, gdp=data.ROW.1990$gdp, the.gdp=data.ROW.1990$the.gdp)

df.ROW.2010 <- data.frame(country=data.ROW.2010$country, le=data.ROW.2010$le,hale=data.ROW.2010$hale, yld=data.ROW.2010$yld, the=data.ROW.2010$the, gdp=data.ROW.2010$gdp, the.gdp=data.ROW.2010$the.gdp)

df.EU.1990
df.EU.2010
df.ROW.1990
df.ROW.2010

ID.ROW.1 <- "JPN"
ID.ROW.2 <- "USA"

# Constant Scale in Graphs

lim.le <- c(30, 85)
lim.yld <- c(4, 15)
lim.hale <- c(30, 85)
lim.the <- c(100, 8500)

```



# Expansion of Morbidity WORLD: 1990-2010

```{r}
par(mar=c(5, 4, 4, 5) + 0.1)

plot(df.ROW.1990$hale, df.ROW.1990$yld, xlab="Health Adjusted Life Expectancy at Birth (hale)", ylab="Years Lived with Disease (YLD)", type="p", col="grey", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2, xlim=lim.hale, ylim=lim.yld, axes=FALSE, frame.plot=FALSE)

points(df.ROW.2010$hale, df.ROW.2010$yld, col="darkslategrey", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)


points(df.EU.1990$hale, df.EU.1990$yld, col="blue", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)

points(df.EU.2010$hale, df.EU.2010$yld,  col="red", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)

points(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], col="black", pch = 8, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)

axis(1, at=c(round(min(df.EU.1990$hale), 1), round(median(df.EU.1990$hale), 1), round(max(df.EU.1990$hale), 1)), col.axis="blue", col="blue", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(3, at=round(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], 2), col.axis="black", col="black", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(2, at=c(round(min(df.EU.1990$yld), 1), round(median(df.EU.1990$yld), 1), round(max(df.EU.1990$yld), 1)), col.axis="blue", col="blue",las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)

axis(4, at=round(df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], 2), col.axis="black", col="black", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(3, at=c(round(min(df.EU.2010$hale), 1), round(median(df.EU.2010$hale), 1), round(max(df.EU.2010$hale), 1)), col.axis="red", col="red",las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(4, at=c(round(min(df.EU.2010$yld), 1), round(median(df.EU.2010$yld), 1), round(max(df.EU.2010$yld), 1)), col.axis="red", col="red", las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)

legend(30, 15, c("EU 1990","EU 2010","ROW 1990", "ROW 2010"), col=c("blue", "red", "grey", "darkslategrey"), bty="n", y.intersp=1.5, pch=c(16,16,16,16), cex = 1)


text(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1]+.3, labels=paste(ID.ROW.1, ""), cex= .8, pos=4, offset = .2)

abline(h=df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], v=df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], lty=1, lwd=1)

ID.min = df.ROW.2010$country[df.ROW.2010$yld == min(df.ROW.2010$yld)]
ID.min

ID.max = df.ROW.2010$country[df.ROW.2010$yld == max(df.ROW.2010$yld)]
ID.max

text(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.min], df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.min]+.2, labels=ID.min, cex= .8, pos=4, offset = .2)

text(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.max], df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.max]+.2, labels=ID.max, cex= .8, pos=4, offset = .2)

```



# Increased Expansion of Morbidity EU: 1990-2010

```{r}
par(mar=c(5, 4, 4, 5) + 0.1)

plot(df.EU.1990$hale, df.EU.1990$yld, xlab="Health Adjusted Life Expectancy at Birth (hale)", ylab="Years Lived with Disease (YLD)", col="blue", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2, xlim=lim.hale, ylim=lim.yld, axes=FALSE, frame.plot=FALSE)

axis(3, at=round(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], 2), col.axis="black", col="black", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(2, at=c(round(min(df.EU.1990$yld), 1), round(median(df.EU.1990$yld), 1), round(max(df.EU.1990$yld), 1)), col.axis="blue", col="blue",las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)

axis(4, at=round(df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], 2), col.axis="black", col="black", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(3, at=c(round(min(df.EU.2010$hale), 1), round(median(df.EU.2010$hale), 1), round(max(df.EU.2010$hale), 1)), col.axis="red", col="red",las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(4, at=c(round(min(df.EU.2010$yld), 1), round(median(df.EU.2010$yld), 1), round(max(df.EU.2010$yld), 1)), col.axis="red", col="red", las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)

legend(30, 15, c("EU 1990","EU 2010","USA 1990", "USA 2010", "JPN 2010"), col=c("blue", "red", "black", "black", "black"), bty="n", y.intersp=1.5, pch=c(16,16, 5, 9, 8), cex = 1)

points(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], col="black", pch = 8, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)

abline(h=df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], v=df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], lty=1, lwd=1)


fun.EU.1990 <- lm(df.EU.1990$yld ~ df.EU.1990$hale)
abline(fun.EU.1990, lty = 2, col="blue", lwd=1.5)
summary(fun.EU.1990)
confint(fun.EU.1990)

fun.EU.2010 <- lm(df.EU.2010$yld ~ df.EU.2010$hale)
abline(fun.EU.2010, lty = 2, col="red", lwd=1.5)
summary(fun.EU.2010)
confint(fun.EU.2010)

```

# Sustainable Quality EU

```{r}
df.sust.EU <- data.frame(Country=df.EU.2010$country)

df.sust.EU$DELTA_HALE <- round((df.EU.2010$hale - df.EU.1990$hale) / df.EU.1990$hale, 3) * 100

df.sust.EU$DELTA_YLD <- round((df.EU.2010$yld - df.EU.1990$yld) / df.EU.1990$yld, 3) * 100

df.sust.EU$QUALITYe <- round(df.sust.EU$DELTA_HALE / df.sust.EU$DELTA_YLD, 3)


df.sust.EU$DELTA_THE <- round((df.EU.2010$the - df.EU.1990$the) / df.EU.1990$the, 3)  * 100

df.sust.EU$DELTA_GDP <- round((df.EU.2010$gdp - df.EU.1990$gdp) / df.EU.1990$gdp, 3)  * 100

df.sust.EU$COSTe <- round(df.sust.EU$DELTA_THE / df.sust.EU$DELTA_GDP, 3)

df.sust.EU$VALUEe <- round(df.sust.EU$QUALITYe / df.sust.EU$COSTe, 3)

print(df.sust.EU, row.names = F)

(ID.EU.Value <- df.sust.EU$Country[df.sust.EU$VALUEe == max(df.sust.EU$VALUEe)])

ID <- "USA"
# ID <- "JPN"

DELTA_HALE.ID <- (df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID] - df.ROW.1990$hale[df.ROW.1990$country == ID]) / (df.ROW.1990$hale[df.ROW.1990$country == ID]) * 100

DELTA_YLD.ID <- (df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID] - df.ROW.1990$yld[df.ROW.1990$country == ID]) / (df.ROW.1990$yld[df.ROW.1990$country == ID])* 100

DELTA_THE.ID <- (df.ROW.2010$the[df.ROW.2010$country == ID] - df.ROW.1990$the[df.ROW.1990$country == ID]) / (df.ROW.1990$the[df.ROW.1990$country == ID])* 100

DELTA_GDP.ID <- (df.ROW.2010$gdp[df.ROW.2010$country == ID] - df.ROW.1990$gdp[df.ROW.1990$country == ID]) / (df.ROW.1990$gdp[df.ROW.1990$country == ID])* 100

QUALITYe.ID <- DELTA_HALE.ID / DELTA_YLD.ID

COSTe.ID <- DELTA_THE.ID / DELTA_GDP.ID

VALUEe.ID <- QUALITYe.ID /  COSTe.ID

df.sust.ID <- data.frame(DELTA_HALE.ID,DELTA_YLD.ID, QUALITYe.ID, DELTA_THE.ID,DELTA_GDP.ID, COSTe.ID, VALUEe.ID)

df.sust.ID

```

```{r}

X <- df.sust.EU$VALUEe

hist(X, prob=TRUE, col="skyblue", border="black", las=1, axes=F, breaks=5, xlim=c(0,1), ylim=c(0,3))
axis(1)
axis(2)
lines(density(X), col="blue", lwd=2) 
lines(density(X, adjust=2), lty="dotted", col="black", lwd=2)
abline(v=mean(X), col="red", lwd=1)
abline(v=median(X), col="black", lty=1, lwd=1)
legend(.5, .5, c(paste("mean=", round(mean(X),2)),paste("median=", round(median(X),2))), col=c("red", "black"), bty="n", y.intersp=1.5, lty=c(1,1), cex = 1, lwd=1)
summary(X)


mu=mean(df.sust.EU$VALUEe); var=var(df.sust.EU$VALUEe)
estBetaParams <- function(mu, var) {
  alpha <- ((1 - mu) / var - 1 / mu) * mu ^ 2
  beta <- alpha * (1 / mu - 1)
  return(params = list(alpha = alpha, beta = beta))
}
estBetaParams(mu, var)

y=function (x) dbeta(x,estBetaParams(mu, var)$alpha
,estBetaParams(mu, var)$beta)
curve(y, from=0, to=1.5, col="blue", yaxp = c(0, 3.5, 10), axes=F, lwd=2, ylim=c(0,3), xlab="VALUEe", ylab = "Frequency")
axis(1)
axis(1, at=round(qbeta(.025,estBetaParams(mu, var)$alpha,estBetaParams(mu, var)$beta), 2))
axis(1, at=round(qbeta(.975,estBetaParams(mu, var)$alpha,estBetaParams(mu, var)$beta), 2))
axis(2)
lines(density(X), col="skyblue", lwd=2) 
abline(v=qbeta(.025,estBetaParams(mu, var)$alpha,estBetaParams(mu, var)$beta), lty=2)
abline(v=qbeta(.975,estBetaParams(mu, var)$alpha,estBetaParams(mu, var)$beta), lty=2)
abline(v=mean(df.sust.EU$VALUEe), col="blue")
abline(v=df.sust.ID$VALUEe.ID, col="red")
legend(.8, 2.5, c(paste("EU mean=", round(mean(X),2)),paste("EU 95% CI=", round(qbeta(.025,estBetaParams(mu, var)$alpha,estBetaParams(mu, var)$beta),2),"-", round(qbeta(.975,estBetaParams(mu, var)$alpha,estBetaParams(mu, var)$beta),2)), paste(ID,"=", round(df.sust.ID$VALUEe.ID, 2))), col=c("blue", "black", "red"), bty="n", y.intersp=1.5, lty=c(1,2, 1), cex = 1, lwd=1)

```
